title: Geth crash - 'panic: close of closed channel'
body:
I keep getting this error consistently.It seems to happen after the chain in sycn'd up.  Does anyone what might be causing it:

I0523 07:04:07.413749 2746 chain_manager.go:670] Fork detected @ e5cfa075. Reorganising chain from #423771 4bd93b8f to 2068e3d2
I0523 07:04:07.414364 2746 chain_manager.go:627] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) in 6.973138ms. #423771 [2068e3d2 / 2068e3d2]
I0523 07:04:07.418502 2746 worker.go:342] commit new work on block 423772 with 1 txs & 0 uncles
panic: close of closed channel

Thanks... I tried running it with merged code but still get the same issues. Is there anything else I should be doing such as upgrading the db or cleaning up the .ethereum folder
